metadata.title: CVE-2018-16999 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc15 has an invalid memory write (segmentation fault) in expand_smacro in preproc.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted input file.

criterions.comment: nasm package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
